title: Arhats, from an album of paintings
description: figure at left wearing tan, grey and red robes, handing a red bottle to tallest central figure; central figure wears a gold hoop earring and tan and grey robes with gold floral designs; small figure in LC drops a red staff with three bundles tied to it (two blue, one red), and reaches upward toward a fantastic animal in URC
creditline: Gift of Yang and Helen H. Wang
